name: atasnalar-bootstrap
description: This Sass is based on Bootstrap ^5.2.3. we don't recommend editing the Sass files directly in this folder. This file has been re-implemented by Atas Nalar with some changes and will be overwritten by us when "New Updates" from Bootstrap are released.

scripts.compress: minify css/atasnalar-bootstrap.css > css/atasnalar-bootstrap.min.css && minify css/social-share.css > css/social-share.min.css && minify js/bootstrap.bundle.js > js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js && minify js/social-share.js > js/social-share.min.js

author: Atas Nalar <atasnalar@gmail.com>
